item.title: BBC1 - The Interceptor
item.description:
BBC1 - The Interceptor

Paul delivered a new score to a prime time UK cop procedural in March 2015. The show went on to popular reception with viewing figures around the 3-4m mark weekly.Â

item.title: RTS Award
item.description:
RTS Award

The Fades won a clutch of awards in 2012, from BAFTA for Best Drama, to the BANFF Best Youth Fiction award. Paul won the RTS award for best theme music for his title sequence.

item.title: Love, Sex & Missed Connections
item.description:
Love, Sex & Missed Connections

This fantastic feature film was written by Kenny Stevenson and directed by Eric Kissack and is a wonderful comedic romance with a unique twist. A real ensemble treat with many of Kenny's friends from The Groundlings in LA, the film is winning awards all over the place - 9 International Film Festival awards so far! I had a blast working with the team, and got to play lots of real instruments myself on the score.

item.title: Littlebigplanet 3
item.description:
Littlebigplanet 3

Paul recently delivered the cinematics and a clutch of adaptive music tracks for LBP3, the hit PS4 title. Variously hailed as a 'showstopper' and winning rave reviews such as USGamer's 10/10, the new title has reached global sales of 1.3m as of Oct 2015!
